  • stephane.analysis.vgradient

stephane.analysis.vgradient¶

Computation of velocity field related quantities. Include : - Energy - vorticity - 2d divergence - strain tensor for 2d matrices. Extension to 3d to be implemented

Functions

compute(M, name[, step, Dt, display])

Compute a physical quantity on the Mdata Can be either : vorticity : vorticity field strain : strain tensor E : total kinetic energy or return any attribute of M if it already exists

compute_frame(M, name, frame[, step, ...])

Compute a physical quantity on the Mdata, for one frame Can be either : vorticity : vorticity field strain : strain tensor E : total kinetic energy or return any attribute of M if it already exists

dU_field(M, i[, step, type, rescale])

Compute the derivatives field using the stephane.jhtd.strain_tensor module INPUT ----- M : Mdata set object Contain the data, either 2d or 3d in space i : int index in time. Could be removed to compute the strain tensor both in space and time OUTPUT ----- omega : np array of dimension (nx-6,ny-6) vorticity field name : str name of the field to add to the dataset.

enstrophy_field(M, i[, step])

Compute the enstrophy field as the square of vorticity

example(M)

get_E(M, i[, step])

make_Nvec(M, i)

Generate a Matrix with vector components for matrix manipulation

measure(M, name[, step, Dt, display])

strain_field(M, i[, step, rescale, type])

strain_maps(M, i)

vorticity_field(M, i[, step, type, rescale])

Compute the vorticity field using the stephane.jhtd.strain_tensor module INPUT ----- M : Mdata set object Contain the data, either 2d or 3d in space i : int index in time. Could be removed to compute the strain tensor both in space and time OUTPUT ----- omega : np array of dimension (nx-6,ny-6) vorticity field name : str name of the field to add to the dataset.
